Working with Global Library Metadata

Quick search

Enter search terms or a module, class or function name.

Class Reference¶

class rws.RWSConnection(domain, username=None, password=None)¶

A connection to RWS

clinical_studies()¶

Return the list of clinical studies as a RWSStudies object. Clinical studies are the studies that you have access to as an EDC user.

metadata_studies()¶

Return the list of metadata studies as a RWSStudies object. metadata_studies are the list of studies that you have access to as an Architect user.

study_datasets(projectname, environment_name='PROD', dataset_type='regular', rawsuffix=None, start=None, versionitem=None, codelistsuffix=None, decodesuffix=None)¶

Return the text of the full datasets listing as an ODM string

study_drafts(projectname)¶

Return the list of study drafts

study_subjects(projectname, environment_name='PROD')¶

Return the list of study subjects, defaults to the PROD environment

study_version(projectname, versionoid)¶

Return the ODM representation of a study version as text

study_versions(projectname)¶

Return the list of study versions

version()¶

Return the RWS version number
